original: @46a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @46a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya t'a ra sragdha ra sto tra /
analyzed: a'arya t'a ra sragdha ra sto tra /
translated: Arya-Tarasasadhara-Stotra

original: bod skad du /üîΩ'phags ma sgrol ma'i me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa /
analyzed: bod skad du / 'phags ma sgrol ma'i me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa /
translated: In Tibetan:üîΩPraise of Noble Tara, the Flower Garland Holder

original: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Venerable Tara

original: sngar shar nyi ma snang ba dmar //
analyzed: sngar shar nyi ma snang ba dmar //
translated: The rising sun in the east is red

original: lha mchog spyi gtsug nor bu dmar //
analyzed: lha mchog spyi gtsug nor bu dmar //
translated: The supreme deity's crown jewel is red

original: de 'byar kha dog de la ni //
analyzed: de 'byar kha dog de la ni //
translated: Adhering to that, its color

original: tshos sar gyis ni bskus pa 'dra //
analyzed: tshos sar gyis ni bskus pa 'dra //
translated: Is like being smeared with red dye

original: 'phags ma khyed kyi zhabs gnyis la //üîΩgus pa'i tha la mo dbu rgyan gyis //
analyzed: 'phags ma khyed kyi zhabs gnyis la // gus pa'i tha la mo dbu rgyan gyis //
translated: At the feet of the Noble OneüîΩWith the crown ornament of devotion

original: de mdzes mgo yis phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: de mdzes mgo yis phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I bow my head in homage

original: nyes byung dus su bskyab bam //
analyzed: nyes byung dus su bskyab bam //
translated: In times of trouble, who protects

original: de ni sgrol ma khyed yin no //
analyzed: de ni sgrol ma khyed yin no //
translated: That is you, Tara

original: bstod gsar me tog phreng ba 'dis //
analyzed: bstod gsar me tog phreng ba 'dis //
translated: With this new praise garland of flowers

original: mchod la bdag gis phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mchod la bdag gis phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I offer homage to the one to be worshipped

original: rgal mi nus pa'i sdug bsngal me //
analyzed: rgal mi nus pa'i sdug bsngal me //
translated: The fire of suffering that cannot be crossed

original: de la rtag tu lus lhung gnas //
analyzed: de la rtag tu lus lhung gnas //
translated: Always falls upon the body

original: skal ba ma ldan 'gro sa gang //
analyzed: skal ba ma ldan 'gro sa gang //
translated: What is the path for unfortunate beings

original: rmongs pa bdag gis ji ltar bya //
analyzed: rmongs pa bdag gis ji ltar bya //
translated: How can I, the deluded one, do this

original: de ltar rtag tu smras nas ni //
analyzed: de ltar rtag tu smras nas ni //
translated: Having always spoken in this way,

original: don med bdag ni stobs chung song //
analyzed: don med bdag ni stobs chung song //
translated: I have become weak and useless.

original: mkha' la nyi zla dpal ldan grags //
analyzed: mkha' la nyi zla dpal ldan grags //
translated: In the sky, the sun and moon are glorious and famous,

original: de ni gzhan gyi smra ba thos //
analyzed: de ni gzhan gyi smra ba thos //
translated: But I have heard the talk of others.

original: de thos long ba'i spyod pa ltar //
analyzed: de thos long ba'i spyod pa ltar //
translated: Having heard that, like a blind man's behavior,

original: mthong rten 'dod kyang gzhan khrid med //
analyzed: mthong rten 'dod kyang gzhan khrid med //
translated: I desire to see, but there is no one else to guide me.

original: sdig pa 'joms ma khyed la ni //
analyzed: sdig pa 'joms ma khyed la ni //
translated: To you, the destroyer of evil,

original: bdag ni skyabs mthong 'dod lags so //
analyzed: bdag ni skyabs mthong 'dod lags so //
translated: I see refuge, I desire refuge.

original: sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i phyir //
analyzed: sems can thams cad sgrol ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to liberate all sentient beings,

original: de la snying rje mi mdzad dam //
analyzed: de la snying rje mi mdzad dam //
translated: Do you not have compassion for them?

original: ma lus par ni snying rje mdzad //
analyzed: ma lus par ni snying rje mdzad //
translated: You have compassion for all without exception,

original: de khongs bdag lta yod gyur na //
analyzed: de khongs bdag lta yod gyur na //
translated: If I am included in that,

original: khong la snying rje mdzad pa bzhin //
analyzed: khong la snying rje mdzad pa bzhin //
translated: Just as you have compassion for them,

original: bdag la de bzhin mdzad 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bdag la de bzhin mdzad 'tshal lo //
translated: Please act in the same way for me.

original: nus pa med pas mi mdzad dam //
analyzed: nus pa med pas mi mdzad dam //
translated: Do you not act because of lack of ability?

original: khyed bzhin nus la gnyis pa med //
analyzed: khyed bzhin nus la gnyis pa med //
translated: For one with the ability like you, there is no second.

original: 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig mun pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig mun pa //
translated: The darkness of evil of all beings

original: de 'joms pa la nyi ma 'dra //
analyzed: de 'joms pa la nyi ma 'dra //
translated: Is like the sun that destroys it.üîΩEven though it is like that, I, the miserable one,

original: de ltar yin kyang sdug pa bdag / mi dge las ni ma tshig pas //
analyzed: de ltar yin kyang sdug pa bdag / mi dge las ni ma tshig pas //
translated: Have not burned away non-virtuous actions.

original: ngan las byas pas bdag ni 'gyod //
analyzed: ngan las byas pas bdag ni 'gyod //
translated: I am remorseful for the evil I have done.

original: skal ngan bdag la skal ba med //
analyzed: skal ngan bdag la skal ba med //
translated: I am unfortunate, I have no luck.

original: nyi ma shar yang mun pa gnag / gangg'a'i chu ni shin tu bsil //
analyzed: nyi ma shar yang mun pa gnag / gangg'a'i chu ni shin tu bsil //
translated: The sun has risen, but it is dark; the water of the Ganges is very cold.

original: de phyir 'gram du bsdad kyang ni //
analyzed: de phyir 'gram du bsdad kyang ni //
translated: But though I sit on the bank,

original: skom yang btud rgyu ma rnyed do //üîΩrin chen sna tshogs @46b yod pa'i gling //
analyzed: skom yang btud rgyu ma rnyed do // rin chen sna tshogs @46b yod pa'i gling //
translated: I cannot find a way to drink.üîΩAn island that has various jewels,

original: nor rnams kyis gang khang pa la //
analyzed: nor rnams kyis gang khang pa la //
translated: a house that is full of wealth,

original: der 'dug kyang ni bdag phongs pas //
analyzed: der 'dug kyang ni bdag phongs pas //
translated: but though I sit there, I am poor.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma khyed la ni //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma khyed la ni //
translated: Blessed Lady,üîΩthough I desire a protector, I have no protector.

original: mgon 'dod kyang ni mgon med bdag /'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig ma //üîΩma la rtag tu dus nas ni //
analyzed: mgon 'dod kyang ni mgon med bdag /'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig ma // ma la rtag tu dus nas ni //
translated: You are the mother of the whole world.üîΩBut if a son always at the proper time

original: nu ma'i don du bu slong na //
analyzed: nu ma'i don du bu slong na //
translated: asks his mother for her breast,

original: de la ma yang skyo bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de la ma yang skyo bar 'gyur //
translated: even a mother becomes weary.

original: mi rnyed nyin re slong gyur na //
analyzed: mi rnyed nyin re slong gyur na //
translated: If one begs for one's daily bread,

original: pha yang bu la khro bar byed //
analyzed: pha yang bu la khro bar byed //
translated: even a father becomes angry with his son.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyis bslangs kyang ni //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyis bslangs kyang ni //
translated: Though I have been raised by the three worlds,

original: khyed kyis 'bras bu gang bar byas //
analyzed: khyed kyis 'bras bu gang bar byas //
translated: you have filled me with fruit.üîΩThe best branch of the wish-fulfilling tree

original: dpag bsam shing gi yal ga mchog / de ni sgrol ma khyed yin no //
analyzed: dpag bsam shing gi yal ga mchog / de ni sgrol ma khyed yin no //
translated: is you, Tara.

original: thams cad la ni ma lus pa //
analyzed: thams cad la ni ma lus pa //
translated: And all the rest,üîΩ

original: sbyin pa khyod kyis khyab bar byas //
analyzed: sbyin pa khyod kyis khyab bar byas //
translated: You have pervaded everything without exception.

original: nyon mongs kun gyi me des ni //üîΩbdag gi lus 'di rtag tu tshig / sa 'og sdug bsngal de la ni //
analyzed: nyon mongs kun gyi me des ni // bdag gi lus 'di rtag tu tshig / sa 'og sdug bsngal de la ni //
translated: The fire of all afflictionsüîΩalways burns my body.üîΩWhen my body is just about to sink

original: bdag gi lus 'di nub tsam na //
analyzed: bdag gi lus 'di nub tsam na //
translated: into the suffering of the lower realms,

original: sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal ni //
translated: when the suffering of sentient beings

original: drag po 'phel bar gyur tsam na //üîΩkhyod kyis dam bcas zhal bzhes pa //
analyzed: drag po 'phel bar gyur tsam na // khyod kyis dam bcas zhal bzhes pa //
translated: is just about to increase intensely,üîΩfulfill your promise

original: bdag gi steng du grub bar mdzod //
analyzed: bdag gi steng du grub bar mdzod //
translated: right on top of me.

original: rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i smon lam ni //
analyzed: rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i smon lam ni //
translated: When the aspirations of the perfect Buddha

original: bdag gi sems la shar ba'i dus //
analyzed: bdag gi sems la shar ba'i dus //
translated: arise in my mind,

original: sgrol ma phan 'dogs mdzad par zhu //
analyzed: sgrol ma phan 'dogs mdzad par zhu //
translated: I request TƒÅrƒÅ to bring benefit.

original: lag bsgreng bstod pa'i tshig brjod cing //üîΩdon du drag por dus pa yis //
analyzed: lag bsgreng bstod pa'i tshig brjod cing // don du drag por dus pa yis //
translated: With raised hands, I utter words of praise,üîΩand for the sake of others, I make fervent requests.

original: gzhan la zhus kyang don 'grub bo //
analyzed: gzhan la zhus kyang don 'grub bo //
translated: Even if I request others, my purpose will be accomplished.

original: khyed lta bu la bdag gis zhus //
analyzed: khyed lta bu la bdag gis zhus //
translated: I request you, one like you.

original: kye ma sgrol ma khyed kyis ni //
analyzed: kye ma sgrol ma khyed kyis ni //
translated: Alas, TƒÅrƒÅ, it is not right for you

original: bdag spangs par ni mi gsha'o //
analyzed: bdag spangs par ni mi gsha'o //
translated: to abandon me.

original: khyod kyi spyan gyis gzigs tsam na //
analyzed: khyod kyi spyan gyis gzigs tsam na //
translated: As soon as your eyes see me,

original: gang 'dod thams cad rnyed par 'gyur //
analyzed: gang 'dod thams cad rnyed par 'gyur //
translated: And will obtain all that they desire.

original: mi bde mi bzod sdug bsngal ni //
analyzed: mi bde mi bzod sdug bsngal ni //
translated: Unhappiness, intolerance, and suffering

original: yang 'byung dogs ni mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: yang 'byung dogs ni mi 'byung ngo //
translated: Will not occur again.

original: bdag ni sdig can yin gyur na ;
analyzed: bdag ni sdig can yin gyur na ;
translated: If I am sinful,

original: / dad pa shin tu 'phel nas ni //
analyzed: / dad pa shin tu 'phel nas ni //
translated: Faith will greatly increase,

original: khyed la dad pa skye mi gsha' //
analyzed: khyed la dad pa skye mi gsha' //
translated: And I will not be able to generate faith in you.

original: ming thos pa'am dran pa yis //üîΩkhyed kyi sdig pa dbang med 'phrog / bdag don khyed kyis spangs ba de //
analyzed: ming thos pa'am dran pa yis // khyed kyi sdig pa dbang med 'phrog / bdag don khyed kyis spangs ba de //
translated: By hearing your name or remembering it,üîΩYour power will effortlessly steal away my sins.üîΩPlease tell me the truth

original: bden par bdag la gsung bar zhu //
analyzed: bden par bdag la gsung bar zhu //
translated: If you have abandoned me for your own sake.

original: khyed ni bden par gsung ldan ma //
analyzed: khyed ni bden par gsung ldan ma //
translated: You are one who speaks the truth,

original: snying rje che ba'i sman pa yis //
analyzed: snying rje che ba'i sman pa yis //
translated: A great compassionate physician.

original: nad pa ma shi bar du ni //
analyzed: nad pa ma shi bar du ni //
translated: Until the patient dies,

original: sman gyis phan 'dod che ru byed //
analyzed: sman gyis phan 'dod che ru byed //
translated: The medicine should be increased.

original: sgyu ma ser sna nga rgyal sogs //
analyzed: sgyu ma ser sna nga rgyal sogs //
translated: Illusions, stinginess, pride, and so forth,

original: ngan pa de rnams kyis khyir nas //
analyzed: ngan pa de rnams kyis khyir nas //
translated: These bad ones will take you away,

original: ri mos khyer bas dal skabs med //
analyzed: ri mos khyer bas dal skabs med //
translated: And you will have no leisure to be carried by a picture.

original: gnas pa'i spyi nor rnga mo bzhin //
analyzed: gnas pa'i spyi nor rnga mo bzhin //
translated: Like a camel, the general wealth of existence

original: skad cig dal ba med pas ni //
analyzed: skad cig dal ba med pas ni //
translated: Is without leisure for even an instant.

original: sgrol ma'i zhabs kyi padmal /
analyzed: sgrol ma'i zhabs kyi padmal /
translated: In the lotus feet of Tara,

original: @47a * // bdag gis mchod skabs ma rnyed do //
analyzed: @47a * // bdag gis mchod skabs ma rnyed do //
translated: I could not find it when I wanted to worship.

original: des ni yi ge du tshig 'don //
analyzed: des ni yi ge du tshig 'don //
translated: He recited the letters of the alphabet.

original: de bton pas ni phan 'dogs re //
analyzed: de bton pas ni phan 'dogs re //
translated: By reciting them, he hoped to be of help.

original: dus mtha' rlung gis g-yas su 'khyil //
analyzed: dus mtha' rlung gis g-yas su 'khyil //
translated: At the end of time, the wind swirls to the right.

original: des ni gtsubs pa'i chu rlabs 'byung //üîΩg-yo zhing 'gul ba'i rol pas 'khrug / de rgyab dpa' rlabs 'gram du ni //
analyzed: des ni gtsubs pa'i chu rlabs 'byung // g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i rol pas 'khrug / de rgyab dpa' rlabs 'gram du ni //
translated: It produces waves that churn the water.üîΩThe waves rise up to the shore

original: brdabs pas sgra grag skad gdangs can //
analyzed: brdabs pas sgra grag skad gdangs can //
translated: and crash with a sound that resounds.

original: 'jigs byed rgya mtsho de las ni //
analyzed: 'jigs byed rgya mtsho de las ni //
translated: From that ocean, the abode of fear,

original: gru chag nub pa'i skabs de la //
analyzed: gru chag nub pa'i skabs de la //
translated: at the time when the ship was wrecked and sinking,

original: snying rje du skad drag po bton //
analyzed: snying rje du skad drag po bton //
translated: I cried out with loud cries of compassion.

original: skad cig dran med bems por gyur //
analyzed: skad cig dran med bems por gyur //
translated: For an instant, I became unconscious and senseless.

original: lha mo khyod la bstod pa yis //
analyzed: lha mo khyod la bstod pa yis //
translated: By praising you, O Goddess,

original: bde bar rgya mtsho phar bsgral lo //
analyzed: bde bar rgya mtsho phar bsgral lo //
translated: I safely crossed the ocean.

original: sprin nag bskor zhing du ba'i nang //
analyzed: sprin nag bskor zhing du ba'i nang //
translated: In the midst of the swirling black clouds and smoke,

original: de la me stag can gyi me //
analyzed: de la me stag can gyi me //
translated: there was a fire with sparks.

original: me lce cher 'bar khyim du ni //
analyzed: me lce cher 'bar khyim du ni //
translated: In the house where the flames were burning

original: ngal nas mal du nyal ba'i mis //
analyzed: ngal nas mal du nyal ba'i mis //
translated: a man who was tired and lying down in bed

original: khyed la rab btung thal mo sbyar //
analyzed: khyed la rab btung thal mo sbyar //
translated: joined his palms in supplication to you.

original: skad cig gis ni glog byung nas //
analyzed: skad cig gis ni glog byung nas //
translated: In an instant, lightning struck

original: myur bar sprin char gyis ni bskor //üîΩsmyo byed glang chen 'gram gnyis la ;
analyzed: myur bar sprin char gyis ni bskor // smyo byed glang chen 'gram gnyis la ;
translated: Quickly surrounded by clouds and rain.

original: /'dzag pa'i chu la reg nas ni //
analyzed: /'dzag pa'i chu la reg nas ni //
translated: Touching the flowing water on the cheeks of the crazy elephants,

original: bung ba'i phreng ba bzhin du thal //
analyzed: bung ba'i phreng ba bzhin du thal //
translated: They became like a garland of bees.

original: de rnams kyis ni h'um sgra sgrogs //
analyzed: de rnams kyis ni h'um sgra sgrogs //
translated: They made the sound of hum.

original: sgra de thos nas zhe sdang las //
analyzed: sgra de thos nas zhe sdang las //
translated: Hearing that sound, from anger,

original: glang chen 'thab tu byung mno nas //
analyzed: glang chen 'thab tu byung mno nas //
translated: The elephants came to fight, thinking.

original: khros nas mche bas mi btag nas //
analyzed: khros nas mche bas mi btag nas //
translated: Angry, not striking with their tusks,

original: 'do li la ni bsdad pa bzhin //
analyzed: 'do li la ni bsdad pa bzhin //
translated: They sat down like on a swing.

original: khyed dran tsam gyis 'chi ba bzlog / pha rol rgal nas rin chen rnyed //
analyzed: khyed dran tsam gyis 'chi ba bzlog / pha rol rgal nas rin chen rnyed //
translated: By merely remembering you, death is averted, having crossed to the other side, precious things are found.

original: de steng mkhar du bsdad du phyin //
analyzed: de steng mkhar du bsdad du phyin //
translated: Then, having gone to stay in a castle on top of that,

original: mi med stong pa nags gseb tu //
analyzed: mi med stong pa nags gseb tu //
translated: In an empty forest without people,

original: shin tu rno ba'i mtshon rnams kyis //
analyzed: shin tu rno ba'i mtshon rnams kyis //
translated: With very sharp weapons,

original: brgyab nas yod par mi ro'i mgo / tri sh'u la la bsad ro mang //
analyzed: brgyab nas yod par mi ro'i mgo / tri sh'u la la bsad ro mang //
translated: Having struck, there are many headless corpses killed by tridents.

original: de 'dra nags gseb phyin tsa na //üîΩral gri phub dag bzung nas ni //
analyzed: de 'dra nags gseb phyin tsa na // ral gri phub dag bzung nas ni //
translated: Having gone into such a forest,üîΩGrasping swords and spears,

original: mda' gzhu bkang nas byung ba rnams //
analyzed: mda' gzhu bkang nas byung ba rnams //
translated: They came, drawing their bows and arrows.

original: zur mig lta zhing khros nas byung //
analyzed: zur mig lta zhing khros nas byung //
translated: They came angrily, casting sidelong glances.

original: rgol nas brdeg tu byung tsam na //
analyzed: rgol nas brdeg tu byung tsam na //
translated: When they came to attack and strike,

original: khyed bsams skyo med smyu gus bris //
analyzed: khyed bsams skyo med smyu gus bris //
translated: you, thinking of them, wrote without weariness.üîΩAs soon as you clearly wrote their names,

original: khyed ming gsal por bris ma thag / dpal ldan khyim du bsdad phyin no //
analyzed: khyed ming gsal por bris ma thag / dpal ldan khyim du bsdad phyin no //
translated: they went back to their glorious homes.

original: rkang pa'i sor mo rab rno pa ;
analyzed: rkang pa'i sor mo rab rno pa ;
translated: The sharp points of your feet

original: / rdo rje lta bus rab tu brkos //
analyzed: / rdo rje lta bus rab tu brkos //
translated: dug in with the force of a vajra.

original: smyo byed glang chen mgo khrag byung //
analyzed: smyo byed glang chen mgo khrag byung //
translated: The blood of the elephant-headed Skanda flowed.

original: 'jigs byed seng ge byung tsam na //
analyzed: 'jigs byed seng ge byung tsam na //
translated: When the terrifying lion came,

original: khyod bos bstod pa brjod pa yis //
analyzed: khyod bos bstod pa brjod pa yis //
translated: you called out and spoke praises.

original: bred nas seng ge log nas thal //üîΩdu ba 'khyil ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: bred nas seng ge log nas thal // du ba 'khyil ba 'jigs pa'i gzugs //
translated: Terrified, the lion turned back and left.üîΩThe terrifying form of swirling smoke

original: 'jigs byed gdengs byed shin tu 'bar //üîΩrtag tu @47b phug byed kha gdangs pa //
analyzed: 'jigs byed gdengs byed shin tu 'bar // rtag tu @47b phug byed kha gdangs pa //
translated: was the terrifying, blazing, gapingüîΩRahu, with a huge tongue

original: lce chen ston pa sbrul khro ba //
analyzed: lce chen ston pa sbrul khro ba //
translated: showing a wrathful serpent.

original: gshin rje'i zhags pas bkyigs pa'i mi //
analyzed: gshin rje'i zhags pas bkyigs pa'i mi //
translated: The man bound by Yama‚Äôs noose

original: sdig pa'i dbang gis de ltar byung //
analyzed: sdig pa'i dbang gis de ltar byung //
translated: came because of the power of his sins.

original: de dus khyed kyi yon tan bsgrags //
analyzed: de dus khyed kyi yon tan bsgrags //
translated: At that time, you proclaimed your good qualities

original: gus pas dad par khyed la byas //üîΩsprul de autpala phreng bar gyur //
analyzed: gus pas dad par khyed la byas // sprul de autpala phreng bar gyur //
translated: and he respectfully had faith in you.üîΩThe serpent became a garland of utpala flowers

original: me tog mchod pa'i mi des thob ;
analyzed: me tog mchod pa'i mi des thob ;
translated: and the man who made the flower offering obtained it.

original: / dpon gyis mig mtshams 'gul dogs kyis //
analyzed: / dpon gyis mig mtshams 'gul dogs kyis //
translated: The master, fearing that he might move his eyes,

original: der bred dmag dpon rim pa yis //üîΩthag pas bkyigs nas skra nas drud //
analyzed: der bred dmag dpon rim pa yis // thag pas bkyigs nas skra nas drud //
translated: and the army of his retinue,üîΩtied him with ropes and dragged him by his hair.

original: rtsub mos bkal nas khrid tsam na //
analyzed: rtsub mos bkal nas khrid tsam na //
translated: When he was led away, having been roughly mounted,

original: khol po de ni na tsha che //
analyzed: khol po de ni na tsha che //
translated: that slave was in great pain.

original: ca co smra ba gtong 'dod nas //
analyzed: ca co smra ba gtong 'dod nas //
translated: When he wanted to cry out,

original: nye ba gnyen rnams kyis ni bor //
analyzed: nye ba gnyen rnams kyis ni bor //
translated: his relatives abandoned him.

original: ltogs nas skom nas mchu skams pa //
analyzed: ltogs nas skom nas mchu skams pa //

translated: That the worldly ones are sustained by each of Tara's hairs.üîΩThe Brahmins who dwell in bliss,üîΩThe lord of the gods Indra,

original: bde bar gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang // lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang // dbang phyug chen po klu la sogs //
analyzed: bde bar gnas pa'i tshangs pa dang // lha yi dbang po brgya byin dang // dbang phyug chen po klu la sogs //
translated: Mahesvara, the nagas and so forth,üîΩThe gods, humans, siddhas,üîΩGandharvas, yakshas, snakes,

original: lha dang mi dang grub thob dang // dri za gnod sbyin sbrul rnams dang // phyogs su rgyu ba'i 'khor lo yang //
analyzed: lha dang mi dang grub thob dang // dri za gnod sbyin sbrul rnams dang // phyogs su rgyu ba'i 'khor lo yang //
translated: And the wheel that moves in the directions,

original: tha med bde gshegs khyim der gnas //
analyzed: tha med bde gshegs khyim der gnas //
translated: The Sugata without end dwells in that house.

original: kye ma rab tu rdzu 'phrul che //
analyzed: kye ma rab tu rdzu 'phrul che //
translated: Alas! He has great miraculous powers.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa //
translated: You are the one who is worshipped by the three worlds.

original: kye ma 'gul mi 'gul gnas pa //
analyzed: kye ma 'gul mi 'gul gnas pa //
translated: Oh, you who are immovable and moving,

original: sna tshogs lhag med dngos po ni //
analyzed: sna tshogs lhag med dngos po ni //
translated: The various things without remainder,

original: kye ma sgrol ma khyed yin no //
analyzed: kye ma sgrol ma khyed yin no //
translated: Oh, you are Tara!

original: kha cig gis ni mthong ba la //üîΩrgya skyegs dang ni sindhu ra //
analyzed: kha cig gis ni mthong ba la // rgya skyegs dang ni sindhu ra //
translated: To some you appearüîΩAs red and white like the sun,

original: dkar dmar kha dog nyi ma ltar //
analyzed: dkar dmar kha dog nyi ma ltar //
translated: The color of coral and sindhura,

original: dpal ldan aindra n'i la 'dra //
analyzed: dpal ldan aindra n'i la 'dra //
translated: Glorious like sapphire.

original: kha cig gis ni mthong ba la //
analyzed: kha cig gis ni mthong ba la //
translated: To some you appear

original: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho drubs dkar 'dra //
analyzed: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho drubs dkar 'dra //
translated: Like a white churning ocean of milk,üîΩTo some your form is seen as golden,

original: kha cig gis ni gser 'dra mdog / khyod kyi gzugs ni sna tshogs mthong //
analyzed: kha cig gis ni gser 'dra mdog / khyod kyi gzugs ni sna tshogs mthong //
translated: Various forms are seen.üîΩWhatever form is desired,

original: shel dang 'dra bar gang 'dod gzugs //
analyzed: shel dang 'dra bar gang 'dod gzugs //
translated: Like a crystal,

original: ye shes mang me thams cad mkhyen //
analyzed: ye shes mang me thams cad mkhyen //
translated: All-knowing, with the fire of wisdom,

original: des ni thams cad gsal bar mthong //üîΩde nyid mkhyen pa dbang po gcig / nges par khyod kyi yon tan ni //
analyzed: des ni thams cad gsal bar mthong // de nyid mkhyen pa dbang po gcig / nges par khyod kyi yon tan ni //
translated: Everything is seen clearly.üîΩThat very wisdom is your one sense,

original: grangs las thams cad mkhyen pas shes //
analyzed: grangs las thams cad mkhyen pas shes //
translated: Your qualities are known by the Omniscient One,

original: yang na de yi sras kyis mkhyen //
analyzed: yang na de yi sras kyis mkhyen //
translated: Or by his son.

original: bdag gis kha gdangs byas nas ni //
analyzed: bdag gis kha gdangs byas nas ni //
translated: I open my mouth

original: bya rog kha 'dra'i sgra dang ni //
analyzed: bya rog kha 'dra'i sgra dang ni //
translated: And the cawing of a crow,

original: sdug bsngal tshad pas khyab @49b tsam na //
analyzed: sdug bsngal tshad pas khyab @49b tsam na //
translated: And the pain of being burned by fire,

original: de skyes na tsha byung tsam na //
analyzed: de skyes na tsha byung tsam na //
translated: When they arise, they are just like that.

original: bdag gis pho rog smra bzhin bton //
analyzed: bdag gis pho rog smra bzhin bton //
translated: I have spoken like a crow.

original: gzhan gyi sems la bzhad gad rgyu //
analyzed: gzhan gyi sems la bzhad gad rgyu //
translated: It is a cause of laughter for others.

original: bdag gis zhus pa'i don du ni //
analyzed: bdag gis zhus pa'i don du ni //
translated: But for the sake of the meaning I requested,

original: ma zhus gong du lhag par mkhyen //
analyzed: ma zhus gong du lhag par mkhyen //
translated: You knew it before I asked.

original: khyod kyi mkhyen pa de la ni //
analyzed: khyod kyi mkhyen pa de la ni //
translated: To your knowledge,

original: bdag gis zhus pa don med gleng //
analyzed: bdag gis zhus pa don med gleng //
translated: My request was meaningless.

original: 'on kyang rang sems dga' ba'i don //
analyzed: 'on kyang rang sems dga' ba'i don //
translated: Nevertheless, for the sake of delighting my mind,

original: nye ba'i gnyen gyi mdun du ni //
analyzed: nye ba'i gnyen gyi mdun du ni //
translated: In front of my close friends,

original: dug dag skyugs pa smras pa bzhin //
analyzed: dug dag skyugs pa smras pa bzhin //
translated: I spoke as if vomiting poison.

original: sdug bsngal don de shes kyang ni //
analyzed: sdug bsngal don de shes kyang ni //
translated: Though I know the meaning of suffering,

original: rang snying yang zhing bde ba bzhin //
analyzed: rang snying yang zhing bde ba bzhin //
translated: My heart is light and happy.

original: phan 'dogs dga' ba rgya mtsho nyid //
analyzed: phan 'dogs dga' ba rgya mtsho nyid //
translated: The ocean of delight in benefiting others,

original: rab tu gsal ba zla ba'i cha //
analyzed: rab tu gsal ba zla ba'i cha //
translated: The light of the moon,

original: kye ma mdzes mas gzigs par zhu ;
analyzed: kye ma mdzes mas gzigs par zhu ;
translated: Oh, please look upon me, beautiful one!

original: / gdams ngag ye shes gnang bar zhu //
analyzed: / gdams ngag ye shes gnang bar zhu //
translated: Please grant the wisdom of instruction.

original: snying rje chen mo khyod nyid kyis //
analyzed: snying rje chen mo khyod nyid kyis //
translated: Great compassionate one,

original: mun nag sems ni gsal bar mdzod //
analyzed: mun nag sems ni gsal bar mdzod //
translated: Please illuminate this mind of darkness.

original: khyed kyi bstod pa'i chu des ni //
analyzed: khyed kyi bstod pa'i chu des ni //
translated: By the water of your praise,

original: bdag gi sems ni gtsang bar bkrus //
analyzed: bdag gi sems ni gtsang bar bkrus //
translated: my mind is washed clean.

original: phan nas byungs gcig rnyed do //üîΩbstod pa 'dis ni 'gro ba'i don //
analyzed: phan nas byungs gcig rnyed do // bstod pa 'dis ni 'gro ba'i don //
translated: Having benefited, I have found the one source.üîΩBy this praise, I see the attainment of the fruit

original: 'bras bu thob pa yod par mthong //
analyzed: 'bras bu thob pa yod par mthong //
translated: for the sake of beings.

original: rab tu bstod pa'i yon tan cha //
analyzed: rab tu bstod pa'i yon tan cha //
translated: The great qualities of this praise

original: bdag gis bsod nams bshad mi shes //
analyzed: bdag gis bsod nams bshad mi shes //
translated: I cannot explain the merit.

original: bsod nams de yi stobs kyis ni //
analyzed: bsod nams de yi stobs kyis ni //
translated: By the power of that merit,

original: 'jig rten pa kun don 'grub nas //üîΩgrol ba'i bde ba myong bar shog / spyan ras gzigs kyi zhabs kyi mthil //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa kun don 'grub nas // grol ba'i bde ba myong bar shog / spyan ras gzigs kyi zhabs kyi mthil //
translated: having accomplished the aims of all worldly beings,üîΩmay they experience the bliss of liberation.üîΩThe sign of the soles of Avalokite≈õvara's feet

original: de yi mtshan ma bkra shis kyis //
analyzed: de yi mtshan ma bkra shis kyis //
translated: is the auspicious mark.

original: de bkang yod pa de la ni //
analyzed: de bkang yod pa de la ni //
translated: In that filled space,

original: bde gshegs sras kyi sa ris yin //
analyzed: bde gshegs sras kyi sa ris yin //
translated: there is the pattern of the stages of the Sugata's sons.

original: bde nas bde ru 'gro ba kun //
analyzed: bde nas bde ru 'gro ba kun //
translated: May all who go from bliss to blissüîΩquickly go and be happy.

original: myur bar song nas bde bar shog / me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: myur bar song nas bde bar shog / me tog phreng ba 'dzin pa'i bstod pa slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The praise holding the flower garland composed by the omniscient spiritual friend is complete.

original: // / pandi ta zla ba gzhon nus rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: // / pandi ta zla ba gzhon nus rang 'gyur mdzad pa'o//
translated: The pandit CandrƒÅpƒ´da made the translation himself.
